```{r}
#| include: false

## Libraries
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(cricketdata)
```

```{r}
#| include: false

# Find his ID
cricketdata::find_player_id("Travis Head") # 530011

# Get player data
travis_head_data <- fetch_player_data(playerid = 530011, matchtype = "test", activity = "batting")

# Get rid of innings where he didn't bat
travis_head_data <- travis_head_data %>% filter(!is.na(Runs))

# Make Dismissal title case except for lbw, which will be all caps
travis_head_data$Dismissal <-
  ifelse(
    travis_head_data$Dismissal == "lbw",
    str_to_upper(travis_head_data$Dismissal),
    str_to_title(travis_head_data$Dismissal)
  )

# Make Inns variable a factor for the team's first or second innings
travis_head_data$Inns <-
  ifelse(travis_head_data$Inns %in% c(1, 2),
         "First Innings",
         "Second Innings")
travis_head_data$Inns <- factor(travis_head_data$Inns)

# Create Calendar Year Variable
travis_head_data <-
travis_head_data %>%
  mutate(calendar_year = year(Date)) %>%
  relocate(calendar_year, .after = Date)

# Create a variable based on whether the Ground is an Australian city
travis_head_data <-
travis_head_data %>%
  mutate(Home = ifelse(Ground %in% c("Adelaide", "Perth", "Melbourne", "Sydney", "Brisbane", "Hobart"), TRUE, FALSE))

# Create cumulative average variable
travis_head_data <-
  travis_head_data %>%
  mutate(Dismissed = ifelse(Dismissal != "Not Out", TRUE, FALSE)) %>%
  mutate(cumulative_runs = cumsum(Runs)) %>%
  mutate(cumulative_dismissals = cumsum(Dismissed)) %>%
  mutate(cumulative_average = cumulative_runs / cumulative_dismissals)
```

## Most Common Mode of Dismissal

```{r}
travis_head_data %>%
  filter(!is.na(Dismissal) & Dismissal != "Not Out") %>%
  group_by(Dismissal) %>%
  tally() %>%
  arrange(desc(n))
```

## Average by Position Batted

```{r}
travis_head_data %>%
  group_by(Pos) %>%
  summarise(Innings = n(),
            Runs = sum(Runs),
            Dismissals = sum(Dismissed)) %>%
  mutate(Average = Runs / Dismissals) %>%
  rename(Position = Pos)
```

## Average by Calendar Year

```{r}
travis_head_data %>%
  group_by(calendar_year) %>%
  summarise(Innings = n(),
            Runs = sum(Runs),
            Dismissals = sum(Dismissed)) %>%
  mutate(Average = Runs / Dismissals) %>%
  rename(`Year` = calendar_year) %>%
  arrange(desc(Average))
```

## Home vs Away Average

```{r}
travis_head_data %>%
  group_by(Home) %>%
  summarise(Innings = n(),
            Runs = sum(Runs),
            Dismissals = sum(Dismissed)) %>%
  mutate(Average = Runs / Dismissals) %>%
  arrange(desc(Average))
```
